sources.title: Lulu's Indoor Outing (1944)
sources.description: Lulu had a indoor picnic because of the bad weather. The old house was haunted by two ghosts. But the ghosts were mean or scary... Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/lulus-indoor-outing-1944/

metadata.Plot: Lulu had a indoor picnic because of the bad weather. The old house was haunted by two ghosts. But the ghosts were mean or scary. When Lulu eats all of her picnic lunch. The ghost realizes that the food is gone. Than take Lulu home and feeds to much from Mamsie
metadata.Actors: Jackson Beck, Jack Mercer, Amanda Randolph
